channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fences blocking resident access to northumberland place. residents have right to access this street why are they being prevented? please remove fences, 29th August
item.description:
People keep blocking legal access to northumberland place during playstreet hours which is not correct please prevent this going forward
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Artesian Road, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Noise Nuisance behind Broadway Market, 29th August
item.description:
Huge noise coming in daytime hours, someone playing very loud music. Affecting the shops and businesses on Broadway Market, and probably nearby homes. Even the ground is shaking sometimes!
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Broadway Market, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside No.16 Hampstead High Street, 29th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Hampstead High Street, Belsize Park, London

item.title: Temporary traffic lights, 29th August
item.description:
Temporary traffic lights up for two days but no work has started. It's causing severe congestion for no reason! How can bexley council allow this??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Road, Blendon, London

item.title: Fly-tipping outside 128 Richmond Road, 29th August
item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping, 29th August
item.description:
This has been reported twice before and it has still not been removed. The previous report says fixed but nothing at all has been removed. It is a massive amount of fly tipped rubbish including fridge, soda, rubbish bags and other items. Please can this be removed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birchdene Drive, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Green space at the dead end part., 29th August
item.description:
Please consider removing the green space and the trees and tarmac all the way down and through. There is way to many cars on the street and by the time it’s 6pm there all parked on paths and god knows where else and forces people to walk in the road. It’s a dangerous hazard for kids or someone to be run over.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ockham Drive, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose Paving Slab, 29th August
item.description:
My wife has trip and almost fell over hurting her toe in the process due to a loose paving slab that was stepped on. The slab is not fixed in place and raised the full width of the slab when stepped on. The remaining section of the pavement is also uneven with smaller trip hazards. Dangerous for the people using the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broxbourne Road, Crofton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
